page.title: 19SHOPS (CONTINUED)
page.content: {POST OFFICE} Midddleton has had a Post Office for over 100 years, but the location has moved at least 20 times. The busiest times are before and after parents pick up children from school. The busiest day is Thursday which is pensions day. {KILPACK'S BAKERY} The actual bakery has existed in M.C. for many years.The Shop is only a few years old. Bread, cakes and savouries are prepared. Ham, ice cream and health foods are sold in the Shop. Busiest time is at lunchtime. Bread and cakes are baked for Chenderit Canteen during term time. {HORTON STORES} The shop has been open for 10 years. Busiest time is evenings. {CO-OP} Founded in 1911. Busiest time is just before lunch. Busiest day Friday. {BRAD'S} Shop has existed for 50 yrs. Only in current use for 2 months.
